neighbors.name: Julian Gene Littlepage
neighbors.claims: Littlepage is a long-term resident of Princeton, Kentucky, residing at a property on State Route 126 [Public Record](https://kentucky.ourstates.org/julian-littlepage). He recently became a widower following the passing of his wife of 66 years, Patty Littlepage, in August 2024 [Obituary](https://www.tributearchive.com/obituaries/32612652/patty-littlepage). His property is situated near the proposed project area, and historical records indicate he served as President of the Princeton Rotary Club in the 1950s, suggesting deep multi-generational roots in the community [Murray State Archive](https://files01.core.ac.uk/download/pdf/227566964.pdf).
neighbors.influence_justification: Elderly resident; historical leadership roles (Rotary) but no current active civic leadership found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with extreme care and empathy regarding the recent loss of his wife (Aug 2024). Frame the conversation around preserving the family legacy and minimizing disturbance to his home.

neighbors.profile_summary: Elderly widower and long-time resident with deep historical ties to Princeton civic organizations.

citations.title: Princeton Leader Archives

neighbors.name: Kyle Noffsinger
neighbors.claims: Kyle Noffsinger serves as the Senior Pastor of Southside Baptist Church in Princeton, a role he has held since early 2020 [WKDZ Radio](https://www.wkdzradio.com/2020/01/28/cadiz-resident-named-new-pastor-at-princetons-southside-baptist/news-edge/). He is an influential community voice who has publicly expressed strong views on government mandates and religious liberty, notably criticizing state restrictions on churches in 2020 [Christian Index](https://christianindex.org/stories/reactions-vary-from-kentucky-pastors-over-governors-request,5000). He is active in missionary work, organizing pastoral conferences in Haiti [Baptist Press](https://www.baptistpress.com/resource-library/news/haitian-churches-not-all-that-different-from-churches-anywhere-kentucky-pastor-says/). He shares a surname with prominent local business owner Charles 'Mike' Noffsinger (1939–2024), who recently passed away [Legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/times-leader/name/charles-noffsinger-obituary?id=56319661).
neighbors.influence_justification: Senior Pastor of a local church; vocal on public policy/religious freedom issues.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage as a community leader. Respect his role as a pastor; focus on how the project aligns with community values, local autonomy, and brings tangible benefits to the area without government overreach.

neighbors.profile_summary: Prominent local pastor with a history of vocal advocacy for local control and religious liberty.
neighbors.disambiguation: Differentiated from Kyle A. Noffsinger, an attorney in Indiana. The subject is the Pastor of Southside Baptist in Princeton, KY.

citations.claim: Kyle Noffsinger serves as the Senior Pastor of Southside Baptist Church in Princeton, a role he has held since early 2020
citations.title: Cadiz Resident Named New Pastor At Princeton's Southside Baptist

neighbors.name: Cody McBride
neighbors.claims: McBride resides at a property on Cadiz Road in Princeton, KY [Public Record](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/m/cody-mcbride/). His property is situated near the proposed Caldwell Solar project area, and he was included in the notification list for adjacent landowners [Kentucky PSC](https://psc.ky.gov/case/viewcasefilings/2020-00244). There is no public record of him holding civic office or taking a public stance on development projects in Caldwell County.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; no public leadership roles identified.

approach_recommendations.engage: Invite him to an informal on-site meeting to hear any concerns about construction traffic or visual impacts. Offer solutions like screening vegetation and clear construction schedules.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private resident living adjacent to the project area with no documented public engagement history.

citations.claim: McBride resides at a property on Cadiz Road in Princeton, KY
citations.title: Cody McBride Public Record

citations.claim: he was included in the notification list for adjacent landowners
citations.title: Kentucky PSC Case Filings 2020-00244
